name: Coffin Dance Hit
description: Love the coffin dance meme? This game is for you. This game mimics the coffin dance where you'll have to hit the coffin with the sticks. You goal is to hit the coffin three times in order destroy it. You miss it and it's Game Over. The funniest thing in this game is that you play while you enjoy the game music. Finish all levels to win the game and tell us what score you get. And don't forget, you get bonus if you also hit the flowers.
